citations.narrative:
The licensee does not have a completed Record of Acquisition (APHIS Form 7005) for the dogs on hand. The date
acquired is missing for 20 of the dogs and 14 of the dogs do not have full adresses for the people from whom the dogs
were purchased. Properly completed acquisition records are necessary for identification of dogs to facilitate record-
keeping requirements for inventory, disposition, transport, and healthcare. The licensee must record complete acquisition
information for all dogs on hand on Form 7005 and must be able to produce these records upon request by the Inspector.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
2.75(a)(1)  Repeat
   
Records: Dealers and exhibitors. 
The licensee does not have a completed Record of Acquisition (APHIS Form 7005) for the dogs on hand. The date 
acquired is missing for 20 of the dogs and 14 of the dogs do not have full adresses for the people from whom the dogs 
were purchased. Properly completed acquisition records are necessary for identification of dogs to facilitate record-
keeping requirements for inventory, disposition, transport, and healthcare. The licensee must record complete acquisition 
information for all dogs on hand on Form 7005 and must be able to produce these records upon request by the Inspector. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
